course_description: This course will explore the many ways in which contemporary artists engage their practice. Students will begin to situate themselves into the contemporary art landscape through a series of visiting artists and studio visits, writing exercise, and readings / discussion.
sections: Class Nbr: 3338, Section #: 1, Type: ART, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 1-4:30p, Instructor: D. Fuller, Status: Open
